1:
The earth is Yahweh's, and its fullness,\q the world, and all who live in it.
\q
2:
For he has founded it upon the seas\q and established it on the rivers.


\q
3:
Who will ascend the mountain of Yahweh?\q Who will stand in his holy place?
\q
4:
He who has clean hands and a pure heart;\q who has not lifted up a falsehood,
\q and has not sworn an oath in order to deceive.


\q
5:
He will receive a blessing from Yahweh\q and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
\q
6:
Such is the generation of those who seek him,\q those who seek the face of the God of Jacob.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
7:
Lift up your heads, you gates;\q be lifted up, everlasting doors,
\q so that the King of glory may come in!
\q
8:
Who is this King of glory?\q Yahweh, strong and mighty; Yahweh, mighty in battle.


\q
9:
Lift up your heads, you gates;\q be lifted up, everlasting doors,
\q so that the King of glory may come in!
\q
10:
Who is this King of glory?\q Yahweh of hosts,
\q he is the King of glory.
\qs Selah\qs*
